function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to chemical and biological contaminants on push plates","Impact":"Potential source of disease transmission, including viruses such as Influenza A and COVID-19","Mitigation":"Employing copper coatings via cold-spray technique to enhance antibacterial and antiviral properties","Technologies":"Cold-spray technique for depositing copper coatings","People":"Individuals using push plates, especially in publicly accessed buildings and hospitals","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Lack of antibacterial and antiviral properties in stainless steel surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, especially in publicly accessed buildings and hospitals","Mitigation":"Replacing steel surfaces with copper-coated components or implementing other antibacterial measures","Technologies":"Cold-spray technique for depositing copper coatings, surface disinfection technologies","People":"Individuals using steel surfaces, especially in publicly accessed buildings and hospitals","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance staff"}]}
